query:
ALTER TABLE reviews 
ADD COLUMN helpfulVotes INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBooking INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN photos TEXT,
ADD COLUMN artistResponse TEXT,
ADD COLUMN artistResponseDate TIMESTAMP NULL
command:
